Headline: IIM Indore seeks to be a contextually-relevant business school with world-class academic standards
ShortDescription: The Indian Institute of Management Indore is one of the best management institutions in India.

Highlights.name: Contextually-Relevant Business School with World-Class Standards
Highlights.description: IIM Indore prides itself on being a contextually-relevant business school with world-class academic standards . This means that they offer a curriculum that is relevant to the needs of the Indian business community, while also maintaining high academic standards.

Highlights.name: Achieved Level 5 in the Positive Impact Rating 2024 by UN PRME
Highlights.description: IIM Indore has achieved level 5 in the Positive Impact Rating 2024 by UN PRME . This suggests that IIM Indore is a leader in sustainability and corporate social responsibility.

Highlights.name: Spectacular Debut in FT Executive Education Rankings 2024
Highlights.description: IIM Indore made a spectacular debut in FT Executive Education Rankings 2024 . This suggests that IIM Indore is a top-ranked business school for executive education programs.

enhanced_description: IIM Indore, established in 1998, is a leading management institution in India. It strives to be a contextually-relevant business school with world-class academic standards, emphasizing a strong theoretical foundation for effective corporate practice. The institute offers a range of learning and development programs, including customized programs, long/short duration online programs, and foreign exchange programs. IIM Indore is recognized for its excellence in executive education, marked by a spectacular debut in the FT Executive Education Rankings 2024. Furthermore, it demonstrates a strong commitment to sustainability and corporate social responsibility, having achieved Level 5 in the Positive Impact Rating 2024 by UN PRME. IIM Indore's offerings also support corporate objectives, such as building a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
